tasks.details: Based on performance audit findings: Implement native lazy loading for all images and convert to WebP format with PNG fallbacks. Extract the 734 lines of inline CSS from index.html into separate optimized file. Add responsive image sizing with srcset attributes. Optimize Liquid template loops for better performance. tasks.testStrategy: Measure page load speed using Lighthouse and PageSpeed Insights before and after optimizations. Test on slow network connections (3G simulation). Measure CSS file size reduction and render blocking elimination.
